title: 游戏崩溃
author: 中国火车迷
txt_content:
用Fabric加载MOD时崩溃，以下是启动器内查看的游戏日志：[10:02:31] [main/INFO]: Loading for game Minecraft 1.15.2

[10:02:35] [main/FATAL]: A critical error occurred

net.fabricmc.loader.discovery.ModResolutionException: Could not find required mod: adorn requires {fabric-language-kotlin @ [^1.3.30]}

        at net.fabricmc.loader.discovery.ModResolver.findCompatibleSet(ModResolver.java:170) ~[fabric-loader-0.7.8+build.184.jar:?]

        at net.fabricmc.loader.discovery.ModResolver.resolve(ModResolver.java:603) ~[fabric-loader-0.7.8+build.184.jar:?]

        at net.fabricmc.loader.FabricLoader.setup(FabricLoader.java:176) ~[fabric-loader-0.7.8+build.184.jar:?]

        at net.fabricmc.loader.FabricLoader.load(FabricLoader.java:166) [fabric-loader-0.7.8+build.184.jar:?]

        at net.fabricmc.loader.launch.knot.Knot.init(Knot.java:127) [fabric-loader-0.7.8+build.184.jar:?]

        at net.fabricmc.loader.launch.knot.KnotClient.main(KnotClient.java:26) [fabric-loader-0.7.8+build.184.jar:?]

Caused by: net.fabricmc.loader.util.sat4j.specs.ContradictionException: Creating Empty clause ?

        at net.fabricmc.loader.util.sat4j.minisat.constraints.cnf.Clauses.propagationCheck(Clauses.java:117) ~[fabric-loader-sat4j-2.3.5.4.jar:?]

        at net.fabricmc.loader.util.sat4j.minisat.constraints.cnf.Clauses.sanityCheck(Clauses.java:97) ~[fabric-loader-sat4j-2.3.5.4.jar:?]

        at net.fabricmc.loader.util.sat4j.minisat.constraints.MixedDataStructureDanielWL.createClause(MixedDataStructureDanielWL.java:81) ~[fabric-loader-sat4j-2.3.5.4.jar:?]

        at net.fabricmc.loader.util.sat4j.minisat.core.Solver.addClause(Solver.java:401) ~[fabric-loader-sat4j-2.3.5.4.jar:?]

        at net.fabricmc.loader.discovery.ModResolver.findCompatibleSet(ModResolver.java:168) ~[fabric-loader-0.7.8+build.184.jar:?]

        ... 5 more
复制代码

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
什么启动器 用HMCL
删除libraries文件夹重新启动试试

或使用此处的整合包
[1.15.2-1.7.10]能力整合-Forge/FabricAPI下的基础整合[持续更新]
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-869469-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)

replies.author: 中国火车迷
replies.txt_content:
折叠 发表于 2020-2-28 10:11
什么启动器 用HMCL
删除libraries文件夹重新启动试试
现在好了，加上一个“fabric-language-kotlin-1.3.61+build.1”MOD就可以了
